#summary Quick reference of built-in functions in RDDL.

= Introduction =

This page serves as a reference for the built-in functions available in RDDL.


= Math Functions =

  * div\[ x, y \] : divides y by x
  * mod\[ x, y \] : x % y
  * min\[ x, y \] : minimum of x and y
  * max\[ x, y \] : maximum of x and y

  * abs
  * sgn
  * round
  * floor
  * ceil

  * log
  * ln
  * exp
  * pow
  * sqrt

  * cos
  * sin
  * tan
  * acos
  * asin
  * atan
  * cosh
  * sinh
  * tanh
